label: FRESHMEN WILL SELECT OFFICERS ON THURSDAY

resource.chars:
FRESHMEN WILL SELECT
OFFICERS ON THURSDAY

Nominations for permanent offi-
cers were made at a meeting of the
Freshman class last Thursday.
President Adams, of the Sopho-
more class, also announced that
several “rat’’ rules would be re-
moved in the near future.
Nominations, election to take
place on Thursday, follow:
For President—Wilford Hearn,
Gordon Kessler, Milton Price and
Daniel O’Brien.
For Vice-President—Fred Lin-
ton, Fred Bradstreet and E. C.
Loane.
For Secretary—Olyure Hammock,
Eleanor Freeny, Virginia Sturgis,
and Emily Herzog.
For Treasurer—Ross Black, Wal-
ker Hale, and C. V. Koons.
For Sergeant-at-Arms—John
Parsons, John Keenan, Francis
Porter, and Walker Hale.
U. of M.
